title: 如何实现Player的药水效果？
author: DreamShadow
txt_content: 如题，这个药水效果（就是服务器里的/effect）在哪个类，应该怎么样写，求大神告知

replies.author: ylmars
replies.txt_content:
Player.playEffect(Location loc, Effect effect, T data) 

Effect 在 org.bukkit.Effect

replies.author: DreamShadow
replies.txt_content:
ylmars 发表于 2015-2-10 00:51
Player.playEffect(Location loc, Effect effect, T data) 

Effect 在 org.bukkit.Effect
是那个例如速度I，力量I的那个药水效果，不是动画效果

replies.author: ylmars
replies.txt_content:
DreamShadow 发表于 2015-2-10 11:37
是那个例如速度I，力量I的那个药水效果，不是动画效果
药水效果才带动画效果- -

replies.author: ylmars
replies.txt_content:
搞错了
boolean LivingEntity.addPotionEffect(PotionEffect effect)

org.bukkit.potion.PotionEffect
